sentences.en: " Chien Pao - sheng's a wily old bird , you know.
And several wily also - rans may hold the final balance of power.
sentences.cn: 还有几个诡计多端的失败者,他们可能会决定最后的胜负.

sentences.en: Chao Po - tao's a wily old fox - "
sentences.cn: 赵伯韬 是老奸巨滑 —— ”

sentences.en: Foxes are supposed to be wily creatures.
sentences.cn: 据说狐狸是狡猾的动物.
他是个诡计多端的老狐狸。

sentences.en: His wily plan rebounded on him.
sentences.cn: 他狡猾的计谋反害了他自己.

sentences.en: In short, the wily old Jew had the boy in his toils.
sentences.cn: 简而言之, 狡猾的老犹太使那个孩子陷入了他的罗网.

sentences.en: Making wily choices about possible jurisdictions is often criticised as forum shopping.
sentences.cn: 对可能诉讼的辖区做精心的选择,经常被批评为“购物式选择法院”.

sentences.en: The boss is a wily old fox.
sentences.cn: 老板是个狡猾的老狐狸。

sentences.en: The succession of rebuffs he had suffered in the platoon had made him more wily.
sentences.cn: 他在侦察排里碰到的一连串钉子,使他学乖了.

sentences.en: The wily Edomite was aroused at the intimation of a possible rival.
sentences.cn: 这狡猾的以东人敏感地觉察到有政敌兴起的可能,便坐立不安.

sentences.en: They became more experienced and wily.
sentences.cn: 他们变得更加富有经验而机警了.

sentences.en: We must eat our fruit from the wily serpent's jaws.
sentences.cn: 我们必须从那条狡猾的蛇的嘴巴里去抢食果实.

sentences.en: What was cried up by the wily merchant often turned out to be most unworthy of praise.
sentences.cn: 凡是那位奸商所大声赞扬的,往往是最一钱不值的.

sentences.en: You're talking to a wily old fish who doesn't take those baits.
sentences.cn: 你现在是跟一条狡猾的老鱼打交道,他不上你这个钩啊!

trans.tran_cn: 狡诈的，狡猾的，足智多谋的，诡计多端的
trans.tran_en: clever at getting what you want, especially by tricking people
